message.content:
1. Tranexamic acid decreased total blood loss by nearly 54% in B/L TKR.
2. Tranexamic acid decreased total blood loss by 40% in U/L TKR.
3. Tranexamic acid drastically reduced blood transfusion by more than 80%.

messages.content:
Statement: Tranexamic acid decreased total blood loss by nearly 54% in B/L TKR and 40% in U/L TKR and drastically reduced (> 80%) blood transfusion.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
